name: c1-offers-sorter
description: A Chrome extension to sort Capital One shopping offers by mileage value

scripts.build: vite build --mode development && vite build --config vite.content.config.ts --mode development && vite build --config vite.background.config.ts --mode development
scripts.build:prod: find public -name '.DS_Store' -delete && vite build --mode production && vite build --config vite.content.config.ts --mode production && vite build --config vite.background.config.ts --mode production
